Unnamed: 4: Reference key to application id of legacy system
Reference key to lookup subvention_type_cd such as RATE CASH_BONUS etc
Reference key to lookup sbv_calc_method_cd such as SPREAD_DEFAULT SPREAD_DEFAULT_PV etc
Reference key to lookup sbv_collection_method_cd such as UPFRONT UPFRONT_STMT etc
Reference key to lookup RFND_PDOFF_CALC_METHOD_CD such as PERCENTAGE EARNED etc
Reference key to lookup RFND_PDOFF_BASIS_CD such as TERM DAYS etc
Stores the paid-off basis code for refund
Reference key to lookup RFND_CHGOFF_CALC_METHOD_CD such as PERCENTAGE EARNED etc
Reference key to lookup RFND_CHGOFF_BASIS_CD such as TERM DAYS etc
Stores the upfront itemization transaction code
Stores the Subvention status (REQUEST  DECISION or CONTRACT)
